title: Alpha Client Icon?
body:
Hey riot 2nd or 3rd post about alpha tonight idk but i thought it would be a really cool idea if all alpha client members got a free icon to show that they helped in the testing and it would also be a good one to tell us alpha client players from normal client players in loading screens or friends list 


PS: New Alpha Client is sooooo good the profile with a ultimate skin icon on omfg gachiGasm moments thanks riot making me so happy lately jinx main who got a new 1820rp jinx made i am starting to have respect for riot now after how they ruined my ranked season after i weent 8-2 placements and got bronze 5 but anyways good job on the client guys even tho im missing my hextech loot 0.o

Im a teemo 

Thank You Riot Games

replies.body: I am downloading the client, cant wait for join Alpha family. I am a silver rank player, which is the rank that most people got. About the Alpha Icon, it will be great that we can show we r helping this game become better and better. I agree what teemo told. Apologize for my English if i didn't tell it clearly{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
sounds cool would be a nice addition :p

I too would agree that an icon for the testers should be made for the purposes of being able to know who else is experiencing the new client. It creates an extra sense of community for those of us trying to find the bugs with the new alpha client.
Yeah like a  heimer icon or a little hammer or something a tool of some sort
